biotools.summary: Cross-platform and standalone tool for analyzing gene expression datasets to highlight significantly rewired pathways across case-vs-control conditions. The Tool is designed to analyze human gene expression datasets (with Entrez ID).

bioschemas.name: Altered Pathway Analyzer
bioschemas.summary: Cross-platform and standalone tool for analyzing gene expression datasets to highlight significantly rewired pathways across case-vs-control conditions. The Tool is designed to analyze human gene expression datasets (with Entrez ID).
